Eat Safely

Create allergy cards:
 Use the "Add New Card" button, select the language and allergy. 

View a card:
Tap a card.

View different cards: Swipe a card to the left or right to view the next card.

Delete allergy cards: Swipe a card to the right.

Gluten includes wheat, rye, barley and oats. These are often found in foods containing flour, some baking powder, batter, breadcrumbs, cakes, couscous, meat products, pasta, pastry, sauces, soups and some fried food.
Crustaceans includes crabs, lobster, prawns and scampi. Shrimp paste is an allergen in this category that is commonly used in Thai and South-east Asian cooking.
Eggs are found in cakes, some meat products, mayonnaise, mousses, pasta, quiche, sauces and pastries. Some food products are glazed with eggs during cooking.
As well as fish meat, you may find fish sauces in pizzas, relishes, salad dressings, stock cubes and Worcestershire sauce.
Peanuts are often used as an ingredients in biscuits, cakes, curries, desserts, sauces, groundnut oil and peanut flour.

Soya can be found in bean curd, edamame beans, miso pates, textured soya protein, soya flour or tofu. Soya is a staple ingredient in oriental food. It can be found in desserts, ice cream, meat products, sauces and vegetarian products.
Dairy includes butter, cheese, cream, milk powders and yoghurt. Some foods are also glazed with milk during cooking. Dairy products are also commonly found in powdered soups and sauces.
TreeNuts (excluding Peanuts) refers to nuts that are grown on trees; unlike peanuts, which are grown underground. This includes cashew nuts, almonds and hazelnuts.
Celery includes the celery stalks, leaves, seeds and the root. Usually found in celery salt, salads, some meat products, soups and stock cubes.
Mustard can be found as a powder, liquid or seeds. Mustard is used in breads, curries, marinades, meat products, salad dressings, sauces and soups.
Sesame is commonly found in bread, usually sprinkled on buns such as hamburger buns, bread sticks, hummus, sesame oil and tahini.
Sulphides are often used in dried fruits and in some meat products, soft drinks, vegetables, wine and beer. Asthmatics have a higher risk of developing an allergy to sulphites.
Lupin is a flower, but it can be found in bread, pastries and pasta.
Molluscs includes mussels, land snails, squid and whelks, but can also be found in oyster sauce, which is commonly used in fish stews.
Wheat, Durum wheat, Semolina, Spelt, Kamut, Eincorn, Faro, Barley, Rye, Oat, Malt, Couscous.
Bread, Baked goods, Baking mixes, Pasta, Crackers, Cereals, Condiments, Chocolates, Sauces.
